amendment.description: An amendment numbered 126 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds from being used to carry out environmental justice activities.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to carry out environmental justice activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A076) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 204 (Roll no. 594).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A076) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 204 (Roll no. 594).
